;+ ; NAME: ; UNIQIFY ; ; PURPOSE: ; Returns the unique elements of an array. ; ; CATEGORY: ; Misc ; ; CALLING SEQUENCE: ; Result = UNIQIFY(Array) ; ; INPUTS: ; Array: An array whose elements are to be uniqued. ; ; MODIFICATION HISTORY: ; Written by: Jeremy Bailin ; 9 March 2011 Initial writing ; ;- function uniqify, array sortlist = sort(array) return, array[sortlist[uniq(array[sortlist])]] end
